author: boma_naps
content: I don't think this is the ideal formula to precisely look at this, because the major factor limiting the maximum blobs per block is bandwidth. Sending more blobs requires more bandwidth for propagation and storage.

author: boma_naps
content: I can't figure out how to type formula on Discord, before we can come up with this we need to account for; Number of active validators in the network, Number of samples of each blob is divided into, Number of samples each validator is responsible for sampling from a blob, Desired redundancy, Maximum blobs per block.
